ygData.subject: The ship is named
ygData.msgSnippet: Allright! Thanks Kluster. Now if you can just give us clearance to leave and open the bay doors, we ll be out of your way. They both enter the shuttle. Brix

"Allright! Thanks Kluster. Now if you can just give us clearance to 
leave and open the bay doors, we'll be out of your way."

They both enter the shuttle. Brix starts to get a feel of the 
controls, while Fliq contactes Spears.

"Hey Spears! It's Fliq. We've got the shuttle, and we're about to 
leave the Cybertronian Fire now, so we'll be back at The Ark in a few 
hours."

Brix turned to Fliq.

"You know, Ramulus helped us alot to get you into that body, Fliq, 
and we never paid him back. So why don't we show him some gratitude. 
We can name this shuttle, The Ramulus!"

"Are you sure? Because Ramulus said the idea wouldn't work. It would 
be like making fun of him for being wrong."

"Alright, so it won't be called Ramulus, but we should combine 
Ramulus with something else. Someone who's debt we owe."

"Well, Iron Raptor risked her life trying to save me from Bronco, so 
let's bring her name into it."

"I've got it! We'll name the shuttle, The Iron Ram!

"Perfect! Now let's set a course for The Ark!"

Brix and Fliq wait for Kluster to open the bay doors.
